hero.title: Manchester City
hero.description: A global football powerhouse with unmatched excellence, innovation, and a commitment to beautiful football. Home to world-class talent and a legacy of triumph.

stadium.subtitle: Our Home
stadium.title: Etihad Stadium
stadium.description: An architectural masterpiece and our fortress since 2003. The Etihad Stadium represents the pinnacle of modern football venue design, offering an unparalleled matchday experience for over 53,000 passionate supporters.

excellence.subtitle: Excellence in Numbers
excellence.title: Defining
excellence.description: Our achievements speak volumes about our commitment to excellence and our position among the world's elite football clubs.

honors.subtitle: Trophy Cabinet
honors.title: Champions
honors.description: A distinguished collection of trophies that represents decades of dedication, skill, and unwavering pursuit of excellence.

stadium.subtitle: Our Home
stadium.title: Etihad Stadium
stadium.description: An architectural masterpiece and our fortress since 2003. The Etihad Stadium represents the pinnacle of modern football venue design, offering an unparalleled matchday experience for over 53,000 passionate supporters.

cta.title: Join the
cta.description: Become part of a global community that shares the passion for beautiful football, excellence, and the Manchester City legacy. Experience the pride, the victories, and the unforgettable moments together.

hero.title: First Team Squad
hero.subtitle: Meet the stars of Manchester City Football Club

featured.title: Featured Players
featured.description: Our key players who make the difference on the pitch

squad.title: Full Squad
squad.description: Browse through our complete first team roster

bio.stefanOrtega: Stefan Ortega is a German goalkeeper who serves as reliable backup to Ederson. Known for his shot-stopping ability and distribution skills.
bio.ederson: Ederson is a Brazilian professional footballer known for his exceptional distribution and composure with the ball at his feet. He joined City from Benfica and has revolutionized the goalkeeper position with his playing style.
bio.scottCarson: Scott Carson is an experienced English goalkeeper who serves as a backup option. Known for his leadership and experience, he has played for several clubs in the Premier League.
bio.kyleWalker: Kyle Walker is an English right-back known for his incredible pace and defensive reliability. Club captain and one of the most experienced players in the squad.
bio.rubenDias: Rúben Dias is a Portuguese center-back who quickly established himself as a defensive leader after joining from Benfica. Won Premier League Player of the Season in his first year.
bio.johnStones: John Stones is an English defender known for his ball-playing abilities. Has developed into a hybrid defender-midfielder role under Pep Guardiola.
bio.nathanAke: Nathan Aké is a versatile Dutch defender who can play as center-back or left-back. Known for his intelligence and reliability in defense.
bio.joskoGvardiol: Josko Gvardiol is a young Croatian center-back known for his pace, strength, and ability to play out from the back. Joined City from RB Leipzig.
bio.manuelAkanji: Manuel Akanji is a Swiss center-back known for his pace, strength, and ability to play out from the back. Joined City from Borussia Dortmund.
bio.ricoLewis: Rico Lewis is an academy graduate who has impressed as both right-back and inverted full-back. One of England's most promising young defenders.
bio.jahmaiSimpsonPusey: Jahmai Simpson-Pusey is a young English defender who has shown promise in the academy. Known for his pace and ability to play as a right-back or center-back.
bio.abdukodirKhusanov: Abdukodir Khusanov is a young Uzbek defender who has shown promise in the academy. Known for his pace and ability to play as a right-back or center-back.
bio.rodri: Rodri is a Spanish defensive midfielder who serves as the team's pivot. Known for his positional awareness, passing range, and crucial goals in big matches.
bio.kevinDeBruyne: Kevin De Bruyne is widely regarded as one of the best midfielders in the world. Known for his vision, passing, crossing ability, and powerful shooting.
bio.bernardoSilva: Bernardo Silva is a Portuguese playmaker known for his technical skills, work rate, and versatility to play in multiple midfield and attacking positions.
bio.philFoden: Phil Foden is an English attacking midfielder and City academy product. Known as 'the Stockport Iniesta' for his technical ability and close control.
bio.jackGrealish: Jack Grealish is an English winger known for his dribbling skills, creativity, and ability to draw fouls. Joined from Aston Villa for a then-British record fee.
bio.mateoKovacic: Mateo Kovačić is a Croatian midfielder known for his technical ability, vision, and passing range. Joined from Chelsea to add depth to City's midfield.
bio.jamesMcAtee: James McAtee is a young English midfielder who has come through the City academy. Known for his technical skills and ability to play in various midfield roles.
bio.matheusNunes: Matheus Nunes is a Portuguese midfielder known for his box-to-box style, dribbling ability, and physical presence. Joined from Wolverhampton Wanderers to strengthen City's midfield options.
bio.oscarBobb: Oscar Bobb is a young Norwegian midfielder who has shown promise in the academy. Known for his technical skills and ability to play as a central or attacking midfielder.
bio.ilkayGundogan: İlkay Gündoğan is a German midfielder known for his intelligence, passing ability, and leadership. He played a crucial role in City's midfield before leaving for Barcelona in 2023.
bio.nicoGonzalez: Nico González is a young Spanish midfielder who joined City to add depth to the midfield. Known for his technical skills and ability to play as a central or attacking midfielder.
bio.erlingHaaland: Erling Haaland is a Norwegian striker known for his incredible goalscoring record, physicality, and speed. Broke numerous Premier League scoring records in his debut season.
bio.jeremyDoku: Jérémy Doku is a Belgian winger known for his explosive pace, dribbling ability, and creativity. Joined City from Rennes to add depth to the attacking options.
bio.savinho: Savinho is a young Brazilian forward known for his pace, dribbling, and ability to play as a winger or striker. Joined City from Monaco to bolster the attacking options.
bio.omarMarmoush: Omar Marmoush is an Egyptian forward known for his pace, dribbling, and ability to play as a winger or striker. Joined City from VfL Wolfsburg to add depth to the attacking options.

hero.title: Club History
hero.subtitle: Over 140 years of legacy, triumph, and unwavering passion

timeline.title: Historical
timeline.description: Key moments that shaped our incredible journey

foundation.title: Club Foundation
foundation.description: Founded as St. Mark's (West Gorton) by Anna Connell and church wardens.

nameChange.title: Becomes Manchester City
nameChange.description: The club changes its name to Manchester City Football Club.

firstTitle.title: First League Title
firstTitle.description: Won the First Division title for the first time in club history.

stadiumMove.title: Move to Etihad Stadium
stadiumMove.description: Relocated to the City of Manchester Stadium (now Etihad Stadium).

ownership.title: New Ownership
ownership.description: Taken over by Abu Dhabi United Group, marking a new era for the club.

dramaticWin.title: Dramatic Premier League Win
dramaticWin.description: Won the Premier League in dramatic fashion with Aguero's last-minute goal.

treble.title: Treble Winners
treble.description: Won Premier League, FA Cup, and Champions League in a historic season.

gallerySection.description: Capturing the essence of our greatest memories

firstTitle.description: The team celebrating their first league title

maineRoad.description: The famous Maine Road stadium in its heyday
